text: It was a fun fall week here!! Here’s what we did. Carpool line cutie. And it rained like crazy during cross country practice so we sat in the car. Hockey! Her hair! His hair! He loves elephants. Her award that is not a surprise at all! Happiest girl alive. His award that is amazing! Baby BFFs. Impromptu photo shoot? Eddie’s mini. I like this fall color so much better than orange. Max went to a football game with a friend and we went to halloween at the zoo! It was super cute! So fun. Fog machine + bubbles. Happiest. It was such a beautiful night too! These were amazing. I want to go back before Halloween. All I have to say about this is… boys. Brownies in the sun. Salted honey butter for cornbread. Cuddles with baby Lucy! Max had a flag football game. And today was the cross country championship!! They both did amazing! Hardest little workers. It’s such a fun sport and so uplifting. We love it! Then Jordan proceeded to eat my salad for dinner and the weekend was over!
html:
It was a fun fall week here!!

Here’s what we did.

Carpool line cutie.

And it rained like crazy during cross country practice so we sat in the car.

Hockey!

Her hair!

His hair!

He loves elephants.

Her award that is not a surprise at all! Happiest girl alive.

His award that is amazing!

Baby BFFs.

Impromptu photo shoot?

Eddie’s mini.

I like this fall color so much better than orange.

Max went to a football game with a friend and we went to halloween at the zoo!

It was super cute!

So fun.

Fog machine + bubbles.

Happiest.

It was such a beautiful night too!

These were amazing.

I want to go back before Halloween.

All I have to say about this is… boys.

Brownies in the sun.

Salted honey butter for cornbread.

Cuddles with baby Lucy!

Max had a flag football game.

And today was the cross country championship!!

They both did amazing!

Hardest little workers.

It’s such a fun sport and so uplifting. We love it!

Then Jordan proceeded to eat my salad for dinner and the weekend was over!
